thread.title: Hilton hotel for Wellington's restored T&G building
thread.title_full: Hilton hotel for Wellington's restored T&G building

author: Catherine Harris
title: Hilton hotel for Wellington's restored T&G building
text:
Hilton hotel for Wellington's restored T&G building CATHERINE HARRIS Last updated 12:09, February 13 2017 KENT BLECHYDEN/FAIRFAX NZ 
The site of Wellington's new Hilton hotel to be opened late this year. 
Major international hotel chain Hilton has finally settled on a location for its first hotel in Wellington. 
The chain, which has been eyeing the capital for some years, will be going into the renovated T&G building, also known as the old Harcourts building on Lambton Quay. 
It will be one of Hilton's DoubleTree by Hilton brands. 
The four-and-a-half star hotel will have 108 rooms, full service, a gym, meeting rooms and a contemporary - probably fusion-style - restaurant.
